Description: Vintage 1970s Hayman 3030 Guitar Baldwin Burns Sound Of Joy Division & New OrderRepainted Gun Metal Grey - Some Chips In Finish but overall excellent condition. Strange that these guitars never got that popular. They are well made and very unique looking instruments. Pre Baldwind Burns and you can see some of that shape in the headstock. Joy Division and New Order used these things on their early records. Up for sale we have a Vintage Hayman guitar. It’s very clean and has super stylish retro look to it. Way ahead of its time. The guitar plays well, intonation is low. The electronics, switches, picks ups and everything works as it should. Not much else to say about this guitar. This particular example is in overall wonderful cosmetic condition for a 45+ year old guitar. Overall the guitar is in very good condition, and there are a handful of random small superficial dings on the entire guitar. Very loud guitar that sounds amazing through any decent amplifier. As with any guitar that’s been sitting in storage it going to need new strings and set up. Please consider this when bidding on my items. Its vintage folks and anything this old will need a minor tune up. Shipping, Payment & Important Details. Your item will be shipped immediately after I receive payment. I use parcel post on most items. If you need it ASAP, please contact after the sale to make arrangements. If there is problem, please contact me before leaving feedback. I will do my best to work out any issues. International Buyers – Please Note: Import duties, taxes, and charges are not included in the item price or shipping cost. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding or buying
Title: Vintage 1970s Hayman 3030 Guitar Baldwin Burns Sound Of Joy Division & New Order
